ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Having trouble, please advise....
ygData.msgSnippet: I think the  WW is around 30. Bugs in NK are usually a tad easier than other mobs of the same con. Just watch out for adds. ... From: bouywunder
ygData.messageBody:
I think the WW is around 30. Bugs in NK are usually a tad easier than other
mobs of the same con. Just watch out for adds.
----- Original Message -----
From: bouywunder <dbacksjp@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 17, 2003 2:49 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Having trouble, please advise....


> Hail, All.
>
> I am a Half Elf Ranger of the 11th season, a faithful member of the
> guild Legendary Legacy, and a Protector of the Pine on the Druzzil
> Ro server. I'm having some trouble and need advice on the following:
>
> 1.) I am "solo"-ing bandits in Western Karana for the xp and
> sashes. I am pulling one or two at time and most con white or dark
> blue to me. The problem is the bandit casters that con dark blue
> are kicking my butt. Any Advice?
>
> 2.) I am trying to procure a perfect quality bear skin for the cape
> quest. I took about 25 brown and grizzly bears last night, and
> didn't get a single one. Any advice on which drops them more
> frequently or how rare they are?
>
> 3.) Finally, what are there yellow and red cons that I may be able
> to take down at this level? I am extremely anxious to reach the
> 15th season and get my dual wield. I have pretty decent gear
> courtesy of my guild-mates. Any pointers would be great.
>
> P.S. I am particularly interested in taking down the werewolf that
> roams WK. He's snuck up on me and offed me 3 times now.
>
> Thank you in advance,
> Jaxun
>
>
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
>
>
> Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
>
>
>
